title: Agenda Generica TI 2026
description: Agenda temporal basada en categorias de tendencia de mercado TI 2026. Sera reemplazada por charlas definitivas via CFP.

agenda.name: Welcome
agenda.description: Opening and logistics for day 1.

agenda.description: Market outlook for technology, open source and AI adoption in 2026.
